code: /* eslint-disable react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/click-events-have-key-events */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/no-static-element-interactions */import React,{useEffect}from'react';import classnames from'classnames';const Notification=({title,type,message,customClassName,timeOut,onClick,onRequestHide})=>{const requestHide=()=>{if(onRequestHide){onRequestHide();}};useEffect(()=>{let timer=null;if(timeOut!==0){timer=setTimeout(requestHide,timeOut);}return()=>{if(timer){clearTimeout(timer);}};},[]);const handleClick=()=>{if(onClick){onClick();}requestHide();};const className=classnames(['notification',"notification-".concat(type),customClassName]);const titleHtml=title?/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",{className:"title"},title):null;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:className,onClick:()=>handleClick()},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"notification-message",role:"alert"},titleHtml,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"message"},message)));};Notification.defaultProps={type:'info',title:null,message:null,timeOut:5000,onClick:()=>{},onRequestHide:()=>{},customClassName:''};export default Notification;
